name: The Last Dream (Darkus)
description:
A horror game where you will have your last dream since you are in a stage of death and you are having paranormal events in your dreams, you decide to investigate to see what causes them but you can not find any reason since it is the time of your death but you dont know. You will have to do puzzles and decipher some things to find out what is happening to you. 

Imporant!!

In the first puzzle test you need to take pictures or write on your phone the color and number that you will find when you watch the vhs tape. This is necessary because otherwise you will be very likely to forget the color and number when you have to put them in the lock.
